feed.title: Cronicle Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cronicle: Version 0.9.81
entry.content:
• Fixes #903 - some ordinal day of month suffixes are incorrect
  • Adjust color label checkbox colors for better visibility
  • Updated TOC.
  • Added section on S3 compatible services (MinIO)
  • Update CHANGELOG.

entry.title: New release for Cronicle: Version 0.9.82
entry.content:
• Add support for proxies (for web hooks and the HTTP Plugin)
  • See: https://github.com/jhuckaby/Cronicle/wiki/Proxy-Servers
  • Fixes #908
  • Update CHANGELOG

entry.title: New release for Cronicle: Version 0.9.83
entry.content:
• Add support for pushover.net for web hooks
  • Special thanks to @Maxzhao1999 for the feature request!

entry.title: New release for Cronicle: Version 0.9.84
entry.content:
• Bump pixl-request to v2.3.1 for upstream vuln fix in form-data
  • See: https://github.com/jhuckaby/pixl-request/security/dependabot/1

entry.title: New release for Cronicle: Version 0.9.85
entry.content: • Another fix for same form-data vulnerability (via pixl-server-user module, which I missed the first time around)
